name: Bubblemistry
description:
How to play:

Left click to place material.

Right click to change what material to place.

escape to end game.

R to restart game

space to destroy material number 5

shift to switch between the two forms of material number 6.

And then just watch the awesome reactions and explosions!

click the round red button to get rid of gravity.

click the triangle button pointing up to increase gravity upwards.

click the triangle button pointing down to increase gravity downwards.

click the triangle button pointing left to increase gravity towards the left

click the triangle button pointing right to increase gravity towards the right.
